author: Sara Aquino
title: Coca-Cola FEMSA anuncia masiva inversión de R$ 600 millones en Mogi das Cruzes, generando nuevos empleos - CPG Click Petroleo e Gas
text:
Conozca más sobre la inversión de Coca-Cola FEMSA. La expansión traerá dos nuevas líneas de producción y más empleos a la región.
El sector industrial de São Paulo celebra una importante noticia: Coca-Cola FEMSA anunció un inversión de R$ 600 millones en su fábrica de Mogi das Cruzes.
La enorme inversión financiera, una de las mayores de la empresa en Brasil, tiene como objetivo modernizar y ampliar la capacidad de producción de la unidad, que ya es considerada la principal y más estratégica de la compañía en el país.
La noticia no solo refuerza la presencia del gigante de las bebidas en la región, sino que también promete impulsar significativamente economía local, con la generación de nuevos empleos, inyección de capital y uso de tecnología de punta.
Mogi das Cruzes se consolida como hub de innovación para Coca-Cola FEMSA
La modernización de la fábrica de Mogi das Cruzes, donde la empresa tiene una sólida presencia desde hace más de dos décadas, representa un gran salto en términos de tecnología y capacidad de producción.
El proyecto implica la instalación de dos nuevas líneas de producción de bebidas entre octubre y diciembre de este año, lo que revolucionará la forma de operar de la unidad.
Estas líneas de producción de última tecnología no son sólo una adición de maquinaria, representan la incorporación de un nuevo estándar de eficiencia, automatización y control de calidad, permitiendo a la fábrica atender la creciente demanda de sus productos con mayor agilidad y volumen.
La expansión también tiene un impacto social y económico directo, ya que La ampliación de la unidad debería generar 85 nuevos empleos.
Estos empleos suponen un impulso para la población local, ofreciendo oportunidades en una de las empresas más grandes del mundo y fortaleciendo el mercado laboral en la región.
La llegada de nuevas líneas de producción requerirá profesionales calificados para operar los equipos, lo que también puede impulsar el desarrollo de nuevas habilidades técnicas en la comunidad.
Según Mario Cesar Schafaschek, director de Supply Chain de la empresa, la decisión de invertir en la planta de Mogi das Cruzes resalta el papel estratégico de la unidad.
La planta de Mogi das Cruzes desempeña un papel estratégico para la empresa y para el Sistema Coca-Cola en Brasil. Nos sentimos muy optimistas con la llegada de las nuevas líneas, que incorporan tecnología de punta que aportará una gran eficiencia en el uso de recursos. Esta expansión refuerza nuestro compromiso con el desarrollo sostenible de la región, explicó el ejecutivo.
Compromiso con la sostenibilidad y el futuro
La declaración de Schafaschek resalta un punto crucial que va más allá de las ganancias y la producción: la preocupación de Coca-Cola FEMSA no sólo por aumentar la capacidad, sino también la sostenibilidad.
La nueva tecnología que se implementará busca optimizar el uso de recursos como agua y energía de forma sin precedentes, alineando el crecimiento de la empresa con prácticas más ecológicas y responsables.
En un escenario global donde la sostenibilidad se ha convertido en un pilar fundamental para cualquier empresa, este compromiso demuestra que Coca-Cola FEMSA está consciente de las exigencias del futuro. La nueva planta será más eficiente y, en consecuencia, más respetuosa con el medio ambiente, lo que beneficia a toda la comunidad.
O inversión de R$ 600 millones Es una clara muestra de la confianza de la multinacional en el potencial del mercado brasileño y en las capacidades de su equipo en Mogi das Cruzes.
La fábrica, que ya es un pilar de la producción de Coca-Cola en el país, se consolida como un centro de innovación y un motor de desarrollo regional, contribuyendo a la economía y al empleo de la zona.
La modernización traerá mayor competitividad, mayor agilidad en la distribución y, en definitiva, un producto aún de mayor calidad para el consumidor.

author: 星洲网
title: 解决积水与烂路困扰 亚沙再也组屋获两项拨款 - 地方 - 花城最热点
text:
解决积水与烂路困扰 亚沙再也组屋获两项拨款
（芙蓉24日讯）芙蓉亚沙再也组屋苦盼多年，终于获得当局批准两项拨款进行维修沟渠及重铺道路工程，以解决长期以来的积水与路面破损问题。
拥有近40年历史的亚沙再也组屋，共有8栋建筑约500个单位，目前入住率达80%。
ADVERTISEMENT
多年来，该组屋面临沟渠破损、排水不畅、道路坑洼及路洞等问题，严重影响居民生活与环境卫生，有居民更形容当地的行车体验犹如“乘舢板般颠簸”。
针对这些基建问题，万茂州议员叶耀荣今早召开新闻发布会，宣布通过其服务中心拨出3万7000令吉，用于维修A座与H座后巷的沟渠工程，而有关工程已在两周前展开，预计本周内完工。
他指出，当地居民多次投诉后巷因重型车辆驶过而损坏，导致垃圾车难以通行，沟渠也因为变形坍塌而经常积水。
“相关问题已持续超过半年，经过评估后，我们决定优先动用州议员拨款处理，其他较轻微问题则会陆续跟进。”
与此同时，他也向森州州务大臣办公室申请特别拨款，用于重铺组屋区的道路，因为该组屋自2015年以来未再铺设沥青，道路状况日益恶化，对居民构成安全威胁。
他透露，道路重铺工程的拨款已获得批准，目前处于遴选承包商阶段，因此尚未确定拨款数额，预计两个月内可正式动工。
针对当地的弃车问题，他也呼吁车主尽快移走废弃车辆，以免影响施工进度，并强调道路工程须待沟渠维修完成后才能展开。
“据了解，这里有超过10辆轿车被遗弃在停车位，希望车主能尽快把这些车移走。”
另一方面，叶耀荣解释，不少居民质疑为何组屋区的基本设施维修进展缓慢，相较之下花园住宅区的工程却更加频繁。
他指出，组屋属于分层地契，必须成立管委会并向住户征收管理费，用于进行设施维护，但多数组屋都面临管理费征收困难，导致维修工程难以展开。
“因为管理费不足，管委会没有能力维修沟渠或道路，只能向议员服务中心或市政厅求助。”
他补充，芙蓉市政厅下设有房屋建筑物委员会，每年会根据各组屋管委会的申请，从地方政府与房屋部申请拨款并轮流分配。
然而，由于申请众多，轮候时间较长，导致亚沙再也组屋的道路维修因此一拖再拖，所幸在芙蓉市议员黄文龙的跟进下，最终成功向州务大臣办公室申请到拨款。
他也提到，房屋及地方政府部曾在2021年拨款80万令吉，为该组屋粉刷外墙，未来也将陆续提升其他设施。
亚沙再也组屋管委会秘书罗斯丽娜指出，每户每月管理费为23令吉50仙，但缴纳率仅有约50%，造成管委会每月只收到6000至7000令吉，仅足以支付清洁工人工资或进行小型维修。
“有些空置的单位已找不到业主，也有一些冥顽不灵的业主不愿意交管理费，所以我们真正收到的费用并不多。”
她也呼吁居民配合维护当地的环境卫生，切勿乱丢垃圾，并希望大家多体谅管委会的难处，不应一味指责。
对此，芙蓉市议员黄文龙建议管委会近期内展开大扫除活动，以改善社区卫生环境。
与会者尚有叶耀荣特别助理植春友与林坚义，以及承包商依斯干达。

author: @daily_trust
title: Maritime workers decry delay in licence renewal for terminal operators - Daily Trust
text: Maritime workers under the aegis of the Maritime Workers Union of Nigeria (MWUN), have expressed disappointment over the continuous delay in the renewal of concession agreement of the terminal operators at the nation’s seaports. President, MWUN, Adewale Adeyanju, who made this known at the 2024 Dockworkers’ Day organised by the Shipping Correspondents Association of Nigeria (SCAN), in collaboration with the Maritime Workers Union of Nigeria (MWUN), in Lagos, said the workers were determined to see the signing of the licenses which had been long overdue. He appealed to the federal government to ensure that the agreements were signed as soon as possible, as this was currently impacting on operations at the seaports. Adeyanju said: “We want to see the renewal of the licenses of terminal operators. There are a lot of dividends that we are getting from giving us responsible terminal operators. Why are you delaying the signing of their agreements? The workers are now warming up, because they are worried about what is happening to their employees.”

author: Oliver Adey
title: It will end at the end of 2024: Deutsche Post will discontinue this practical service
text:
Deutsche Post has announced the end of an important service. The service will continue until December 2024, then it will finally end.
The end of an era begins: For many years, Deutsche Post also took care of lost property and, if possible, delivered it to its owner. The postal company charges a fee for this, but what are a few euros compared to a lot of stress and hassle.
Key service is discontinued
But the “key service” will end in December 2024, as the company states in its list of services and prices. So far, found keys can be thrown into the mailbox without postage.
If they have a tag with a deliverable address, the post office delivers the keys to a lost and found service provider, who then sends the key to the owner. This costs the owners a one-off fee of 8.50 euros.
It is not the case that the name and address are printed on the trailer. That would be an extreme security gap with front door keys. Rather, there are codes printed on the tags that customers can buy from relevant service providers.
The change is also hitting this industry hard
Service providers like Keymail, KeyGarant or Payback are hit hard by the discontinuation of the service because they ultimately sell these special key fobs. As the consumer portal Paketda reports, Keymail alone has around 750,000 customers in Germany.
The company announced that it would now work with Deutsche Post on a solution so that the service could still be offered in 2025. The Keymail key fobs could also be reported as found via SMS. An alternative may emerge.
Nevertheless, the discontinuation of the service is likely to cause sadness for many, after all, lost keys are a huge nuisance.

author: Mathew Huff
title: Mikal Bridges Unhappy With Limited Playing Time Against Bucks
text: [ Headlines ](https://www.basketballinsiders.com/category/basketball-headlines/) Mikal Bridges Unhappy With Limited Playing Time Against Bucks Mikal Bridges is one of the toughest players in the NBA. He is also an up and coming star on the rise. Ever since the trade from the Phoenix Suns last season, Bridges has shouldered a bigger role and has excelled so far as the first option for the young Brooklyn Nets. However, the small forward did express some frustration over the limited playing time against the Milwaukee Bucks. “Didn’t like the choice and whatever that was,” Bridges said when asked about the low minutes against Milwaukee. “But it’s whatever. Definitely was not a fan.” Head coach, Jacque Vaughn, addressed the decision. “My thought was getting a feel and pulse of the game. Mikal played 40 minutes last night and so the thought was it wouldn’t be wise for me to continue and go down this path and have him play 40 minutes again,” Vaughn said. “I ran Cam (Johnson), Royce (O’Neale), and Mikal pretty long in the first quarter. Just envisioned at the end of the night that I didn’t want them touching 40 minutes again. That’s really what it boiled down to.” If there is any conclusion fans can come to after this situation, it is that Mikal Bridges is a player who has a passion to win no matter the cost. Mikal Bridges Voices Frustration With Low Playing Time in Game Against Milwaukee Bucks Mikal Bridges’ Impact This Season Bridges is having another solid campaign for the Brooklyn Nets. So far, he is tallying 21.1 points, 5.3 total rebounds, 3.8 assists per game, and an effective field goal percentage of 52.1 percent. While his defensive numbers have taken a dip, it is vital to remember that he is being asked to bear more offensive responsibility. As a result, he is exuding more effort at that end of the floor, whereas in Phoenix, he could solely focus on the defensive side of the floor. On the year, Bridges has a defensive rebound percentage of 13.3 percent, a career-high in this category, nearly a steal per game, and a defensive win-share total of 0.7. His defensive numbers are not jumping off the charts like they used to. It is also imperative to remember he is sometimes matched up with the best stars in the league. Stars such as Zach LaVine, Jaylen Brown, Trae Young, and Damian Lillard have all spent time being guarded by the former Phoenix Sun this year. All in all, Mikal Bridges is still having a solid offensive campaign and is developing into a star for the Brooklyn Nets. Can he Lead the Brooklyn Nets to the Playoffs? The Nets are currently the ninth seed in the Eastern Conference. They would be in the play-in tournament if the postseason were to start tomorrow. With teams such as the Orlando Magic and Indiana Pacers improving this year, the Nets have regressed a bit. Last season, the team finished as the sixth seed in the Eastern Conference. However, there is still a lot of season left to play. If Bridges and the Nets can string together a couple runs soon, they could find themselves back in the thick of the postseason picture. With the way Mikal Bridges has developed since last season, this possibility may be more realistic than one believes. - [2024 NBA All-Star Votes: LeBron James, Giannis Antetokounmpo Lead First Round Fan Voting](https://www.basketballinsiders.com/news/2024-nba-all-star-voting-lebron-james-giannis-antetokounmpo-lead-first-round-fan-votes/) - author: Tribune News Service
title: MC launches fogging drive - The Tribune
text:
MC launches fogging drive
To prevent the spread of mosquito-borne diseases such as dengue and malaria, the Municipal Corporation (MC) has initiated a fogging drive across all wards. Mayor Jatinder Singh Moti Bhatia said fogging would be conducted regularly to ensure the well-being of residents.
The drive has been proven effective in reducing mosquito population and minimising the risk of disease transmission.
By making fogging a regular feature, the corporation aims to create a safer environment for its residents, he said, adding that the proactive step demonstrates the MC’s commitment to protecting public health, particularly during these months.
Vector-borne diseases such as dengue and malaria are a significant threat to human health and there is a need to take preventive measures.

author: News Direct
title: Comcast Begins Construction to Connect 1,600 Homes and Businesses in Medical Lake to Reliable, High-Speed Internet
text:
Recent Quotes View Full List My Watchlist Create Watchlist Indicators Industrial Estimate Composite Estimate 500 Stocks Estimate Gold Crude Oil Markets Stocks ETFs Tools Overview News Currencies International Treasuries Comcast Begins Construction to Connect 1,600 Homes and Businesses in Medical Lake to Reliable, High-Speed Internet By: News Direct October 17, 2024 at 17:00 PM EDT --News Direct--
In partnership with the City of Medical Lake, Comcast will begin construction in the public rights of way to expand the availability of reliable, high-speed, symmetrical Internet in the City of Medical Lake, enhancing digital infrastructure, promoting economic growth, and positioning residents and local businesses for success in an increasingly digital world. Comcast will construct the infrastructure to connect 1,600 Medical Lake homes and businesses to this fiber network, which brings Internet, mobile, entertainment, and security services from Xfinity and Comcast Business services to residents businesses for the first time.
“I am thrilled that Comcast is bringing high-speed Internet to our community. This development is a game-changer for our residents and businesses, opening doors to new opportunities and ensuring that everyone can stay connected in today’s digital age. High-speed Internet is not just a convenience; it's a crucial tool for education, economic growth, and enhancing the quality of life in Medical Lake,” said Terri Cooper, Mayor of Medical Lake.
Residents can visit Xfinity.com/mytown and enter their addresses for additional details on construction timing and upcoming service availability. The project is expected to be completed in 2025. Comcast’s most recent expansion to Medical Lake is part of the company’s latest investment in Spokane County, which also includes expansions to Chattaroy and Four Lakes.
“Access to technology is a powerful driver of economic growth and innovation, and we look forward to connecting Medical Lake residents to all the opportunities broadband offers. We are expanding our network over 25 miles to connect homes and businesses to reliable and fast broadband service,” said Roy Novosel, vice president of engineering, Comcast Pacific Northwest Region.
Residents can expect to see construction in Medical Lake going north to south between Beverly Avenue and Tule Pond and east to west from South Brayton Road to Medical Lake. Signs will be posted indicating work areas. Temporary road closures or detours may be required, and parking may be restricted in construction zones. Access to properties will be maintained as much as possible during construction. Residents will be notified by the construction contractor, MasTec , at least 10 days in advance of any temporary restrictions or road closures.
A Network You Can Trust to be Reliable, Fast and Secure
Comcast’s state-of-the-art network is built to enable residents and businesses to thrive in today’s constantly connected world. Medical Lake joins the more than 63 million homes and businesses across the country to have access to a network that is trusted by essential community organizations like hospitals, schools, transportation systems and first responders, and federal agencies like the Department of Defense and FEMA. It delivers multi-gigabit Internet speeds, 99.9 percent reliability and security built in from the ground up to keep customers safe from cyber threats.
Introducing Xfinity for Consumers
Comcast’s residential services are marketed under the Xfinity and NOW brands, and consumers in Medical Lake will be able to/can take advantage of Xfinity’s and NOW’s full suite of products, including Internet , video , mobile , voice and home security . With multi-gigabit Internet speeds, powerful WiFi that reaches every corner of the home, and super-responsive connections with low lag available with its plan, customers have a great experience using their connected devices to stream their favorite sports and entertainment content, video chat with coworkers and friends, learn from home or simply surf the web.
Comcast Business to Power Medical Lake’s Workforce
For local businesses, Comcast Business offers a suite of connectivity, communications, networking, cybersecurity, wireless, and managed solutions to help organizations of all sizes achieve their business goals. Industry analysts and associations have consistently recognized Comcast Business as a leader and innovator in flexible, scalable options as well as one of the fastest-growing providers of Ethernet services.
What it means for the Medical Lake Community
Comcast’s commitment to communities goes beyond building the network and aims to increase economic mobility for the local community and its residents. That’s why Comcast created Internet Essentials , a broadband adoption program that offers eligible households low-cost, high-speed Internet and affordable computers. Additionally, over the past three years, Comcast has invested more than $130 million in cash and in-kind donations into California nonprofits focused on helping people build digital skills, expanding WiFi-connected Lift Zones and funding connectivity and Internet adoption programs.
About Medical Lake
The city of Medical Lake is a vibrant resort community of 4,950 residents located 13 miles west of Spokane. Medical Lake is a serene 26 acre lake and lies in the heart of downtown with West Medical Lake and Silver Lake to the West and East ends of town. Each lake attracts a unique outdoor enthusiast. The City of Medical Lake, the hidden gem of Spokane County, offers lakes, trails and outdoor recreation along with seasonal festivals attracting visitors to experience the fun and nostalgia found only at the lake.
Incorporated in 1890, Medical Lake has a strong native heritage tied to the “healing waters of Medical Lake’’. Once the premier resort town of the region, thousands came from Spokane each day during summer months transported by electric trolley to stay in hotels and swim in the lake. Medical Lake was known for its healing properties, granite quarries and brick factories used in building most of downtown Spokane. Many of Spokane’s historic downtown buildings still stand on Medical Lake granite foundations.
Comcast Corporation (Nasdaq: CMCSA) is a global media and technology company. From the connectivity and platforms we provide, to the content and experiences we create, our businesses reach hundreds of millions of customers, viewers, and guests worldwide. We deliver world-class broadband, wireless, and video through Xfinity, Comcast Business, and Sky; produce, distribute, and stream leading entertainment, sports, and news through brands including NBC, Telemundo, Universal, Peacock, and Sky; and bring incredible theme parks and attractions to life through Universal Destinations & Experiences. Visit www.comcastcorporation.com for more information.
Contact Details Comcast
Jack Follman
